info.p: NTriples is a simple serialization format for the Resource Description Framework (RDF). Using NTriples you can represent data as a Subject-Predicate-Object triple, which is the core structure for Linked Data and Semantic Web technologies. It can be used for lexical resourcesâ€”dictionaries, thesauri, terminologies, and wordnets, or for text annotation tasks.
